articles.author: Elliot Smith
articles.title: European markets mixed as Covid cases weigh on global sentiment; Burberry down 7% on CEO exit - CNBC
articles.description: European stocks were mixed on Monday morning, reflecting mixed sentiment in Asia-Pacific markets overnight.
articles.content: LONDON European stocks were muted on Monday morning, reflecting mixed sentiment in Asia-Pacific markets overnight as investors monitored rising Covid-19 around the globe.The pan-European Stoxx 600 ho… [+3028 chars]

articles.author: AFP
articles.title: Mask-free and 'low risk', Italy welcomes milestone - New Straits Times
articles.description: ROME: All of Italy became a mask-free, "low-risk" zone for coronavirus Monday, marking a dramatic milestone for the first European country to be hit by the global pandemic in February 2020.

articles.author: Andrea Montolivo, Adapted by Andrew McDougall
articles.title: Federico Chiesa follows in father's footsteps - MARCA.com
articles.description:
When he scored the opening goal for Italy against Austria on Saturday, Federico Chiesa was following in his father's footsteps by scoring at a European Championship. 

Enrico
articles.content:
